filemanager-integration.name: Able to integration with file manager app
filemanager-integration.name[zh_CN]: 能够与文件管理器集成
filemanager-integration.description[zh_CN]: 如果启用，它就能与文件管理器集成。如果禁用，则在任何情况下都不会尝试打开文件管理器。
filemanager-integration.description: If enabled, it's able to integrate with file manager. If disabled, will not try to open up file manager in any case.
